pageContext.claim: “When I became your president, we had planes that were 50 years old. We had a military that was tired.”
pageContext.analysis: The Air Force uses an updated version of the U-2 spy plane, not the same model that was flying five or six decades ago. A Cold War-era B-52 plane was refurbished last year, and another was refurbished in 2015. They did not fly continuously for 50 or 60 years.
